result.name: the-potential-new-provider-tracker
result.notes: A working list of all institutions which are usually schools that approach the National College for Teaching and Leadership to seek accreditation as providers of initial teacher training. It contains institutional data, and some personal business contact details. Not subject to licence.

organization.name: national-college-for-teaching-and-leadership
organization.title: National College for Teaching and Leadership
organization.description: Created on 1 April 2013, when the "National College  for Leadership of Schools and Children's Services" merged with the "Teaching Agency" to become the "National College for Teaching and Leadership".

result.title: The Potential New Provider Tracker

extras.value: For internal use only for tracking activity in relation to schools. Data not to be published due to the nature of the content deemed personal sensitive data under the Data Protection Act.
